pita_algorithm.base.asset_parsing.parser module¶

class pita_algorithm.base.asset_parsing.parser.Parser[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to parse xml-file in given path to mujoco’s MJCF-object.

Parses xml-file to MJCF-object.

Parameters:

Returns:

Mjcf object of given xml-file

Return type:
